mapper.select: SELECT c.name as typename, a.brdid, a.title, b.nickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_freeboard_likes d WHERE a.brdid = d.brdid AND likes = 1) as likes, CASE WHEN a.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate FROM brd_freeboard a LEFT JOIN info_userinfo b ON a.userno = b.userno LEFT JOIN cod_freeboard c ON a.frid = c.frid WHERE c.ptypeid = 1 ORDER BY likes DESC, a.regdate desc LIMIT 15

SELECT b.nid, b.title, CASE WHEN b.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM info_notice_reply c WHERE c.nid = b.nid ) as repcount
FROM info_notice b ORDER BY b.regdate DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.brdid, a.title, CASE WHEN a.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.name as typename, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_employment_reply c WHERE c.brdid = a.brdid ) as repcount
FROM brd_employment a LEFT JOIN cod_employment b on a.empid = b.empid WHERE b.ptypeid = 3 ORDER BY brdid DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT a.brdid, a.title, CASE WHEN a.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.name as typename, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_schoolwork_reply c WHERE c.brdid = a.brdid ) as repcount
FROM brd_schoolwork a LEFT JOIN cod_schoolwork b ON a.swid = b.swid WHERE b.ptypeid = 5 ORDER BY brdid DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT a.brdid, a.title, CASE WHEN a.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.name as orgname, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_orgnization_reply c WHERE c.brdid = a.brdid ) as repcount
FROM brd_orgnization a LEFT JOIN info_organization b on a.orgid = b.orgid ORDER BY brdid DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT a.brdid, a.title, CASE WHEN a.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, c.name as typename, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_extratips_reply c WHERE c.brdid = a.brdid ) as repcount FROM brd_extratips a LEFT JOIN cod_extratips c ON a.tipid = c.tipid WHERE c.ptypeid = #{ptypeid} ORDER BY brdid DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT b.brdid, b.title, CASE WHEN b.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(b.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, a.nickname as writer, b.count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM brd_questions_reply c WHERE c.brdid = b.brdid) as repcount FROM brd_questions b LEFT JOIN info_userinfo a on b.userno = a.userno WHERE 1=1
AND b.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND a.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY b.brdid DESC LIMIT #{skiprow}, #{pagerow}
